title: Strengthening Service Quality Practical Competencies: Simulation Training Program Based on Mathematics Education Theory

context.prior_knowledge: Three or More Years of Mathematics Education Experience or Educational Administration Background
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can design strategies to enhance understanding by applying Pirie and Kieren’s "folding-back" concept to VR simulations
Learners can develop instructional models analyzing essential differences in mathematical concepts based on variation theory
Learners can propose at least three customized instructional improvement plans based on theory-driven instructional research findings
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
